title: Fix archive script with template-based testing
description: The archive skill scripts have bugs - they don't properly reset index.json after cleanup. Add comprehensive tests using generated fixtures from schema templates to catch regressions.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create tests/fixtures/prd-archive/ directory with template generator script
Template generator creates valid index.json and story files from schema
Test: archive-snapshot.sh creates timestamped archive with all files
Test: cleanup-completed.sh removes only passes=true stories
Test: After cleanup, index.json has empty completed array
Test: After cleanup, pending array contains only non-completed story IDs
Test: Blocked stories are preserved (not deleted)
Fix any bugs discovered by tests in archive scripts
Tests run as part of tests/test-ralph.zsh or separate test file
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: fix: US-115 archive script with template-based tests
